author: jainshilpi
body:
This is essentially a backport of #33517 This again only adds a few configs. The added configs can then be used by analysers with EgammaPostRecoTools to embed in the PAT objects.

Code which can be used to test this: https://github.com/jainshilpi/TestAnalyser  (now fixed the wrong inclusion of a .h file)

File to be used for this: cmsRun run_run3_11X.py   (same can be used)
title: Backport of #33517: Adding HtoZZ UL ID configs
